physical_appearance: This is a set of four rolls of ribbons. They are of varying lengths and embroided designs. The roll on the top-left has a light background, with a scrolling red and blue lace pattern. The roll on the bottom-left has a scallop edge on one side, with a scrolling flower and leaf pattern in red. The roll in the center has a blue geometric pattern. The roll on the right has a repeated square pattern in blue and gray.
sgcool_label_text: There are 4 rolls of ribbon of varying lengths and embroidered designs. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of materials used in the making of kebayas and baju panjangs.
title_text: A Group of 4 Ribbons Patterned Ribbons
